Author: EXODIUS PROJECT
Title: [AIRDROP] [ICO] Exodius project : The cryptocurrency of the future
Body: https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/36519241_987177581456451_6513497245038411776_n.jpg?_nc_cat=0&oh=06629a86fec84a229fe318a397fafcfc&oe=5BA813D4 EXODIUS PROJECT  EXO Token is the cryptocurrency of the EXODIUS project, its ICO will start on July 28, 2018 on the Waves platform.  The objective of the project is to familiarize the community with the use of cryptocurrency in everyday life, with the aim of making it evolve in the right direction.  In order to reach its goal, EXODIUS wishes to create open spaces gathering a number of technologies and services, called here: ExopenSpace (a place of meeting, work and relaxation, which will use the EXO Token in every possible way).  EXODIUS wishes to focus on partnerships, so as to offer an ever more diversified, fast, secure and accessible to all service.  No matter who you are and where you come from, join us, and become without further delay, a player in technological and economic evolution.   If you would like more information on the project, please visit our website: www.exodius.org  We are also active in: Medium: https://medium.com/@EXODIUS9 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/exodiusproject/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/@EXODIUS9 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/exodius-project/  You can also participate in the Airdrop of the EXO token by joining our Telegram channel: https://t.me/exopenspace  Airdrop is 50 EXO Tokens and additional 100 EXO Tokens per referral To participate you need to create a WAVES platform account and get your deposit address. To refer someone you just need to send him your WAVES address
